Description:
Detects when an attacker adds a new "Debugger" value to the "Hangs" key in order to achieve persistence which will get invoked when an application crashes

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Add Debugger Entry To Hangs Key For Persistence
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\software\microsoft\windows\windows error reporting\hangs\debugger%'
